title: The Step on the Stair
description: The story is divided into four 'Book's: I The three Edgars, II Hidden, III Which of us Two? IV Love.There is a frontispiece...a floor plan, captioned "A rude drawn diagram, large enough to be seen from all parts of the court room, fell into view."The title page includes, in addition to the title and the author's name, a list of some of her other titles; and A.L. Burt Company, Publishers, New York. Published by arrangement with Dodd, Mead & Company. Printed in U.S.A.The obverse of the title page has only: Copyright 1923 By Dodd, Mead and Company, Inc. Printed in the U.S.A.
author: Anna Katharine Green
